Debdeep Bhattacharya

View the Project on GitHub debdeepbh/debdeepbh.github.io

Find out name of the linux distribution 

 cat /etc/*-release

typically, os-release has all the info, including the pretty name. For the linux kernel version, do

cat /proc/version

This project is maintained by debdeepbh
